entities.name: james
entities.description: James is Albus's older brother. He is mentioned as being cocky and likes to have a laugh.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is James's younger brother. He is concerned about writing letters to his parents.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Albus and James's mother. She is mentioned as writing letters to James three times a week last year.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Ginny's husband and Albus and James's father. He is mentioned as not believing everything James tells him about Hogwarts.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school that James attends. Harry does not believe everything James tells him about it.
